nodes.text: Mei-mei tea was a type of tea that was served at Ember's Fire, a brothel located in the Noua archipelago on the planet Telerath. The Human ex-Jedi Dass Jennir ordered food and a pot of mei-mei tea from the waitress Nikollane while staying at Ember's in 19 BBY. Nikollane then informed Jennir that her son, Dado, had run off to join a gang of slavers, so the ex-Jedi left before his tea was made to try and stop Dado.

Mei-mei tea was first mentioned in the sixteenth issue of the Star Wars: Dark Times comic book series, released in April 2010. The issue was part of the Blue Harvest story arc, which was written by Randy Stradley under the name Mick Harrison in 2009.
